data.text: @donmoyn I'm all for reducing Administrative burdens, and you've taught me the value of that, @donmoyn .  I'm not sure this would've been my first step though.
@donmoyn In addition to the form, the airlines checked test results for me (and a few Iâ€™ve spoken to)
@donmoyn @besttrousers Had to upload test result for air Canada days ago
@donmoyn I recently came back stateside and was never presented with this form, and had to show an ART test done by a medical entity (not a self-test).  Which airline offered this option?
@lutzfernandez @donmoyn hmmm, though we all know entry & immigration processing entry varies wildly by port of entry. It's entirely possible nothing about the policy has changed...America!
@donmoyn Would be cool if the govt would announce this major change!
@lutzfernandez Same here - seems to be, not sure when they changed it. The hassle with the previous system was finding a test provider that would provide a high level of detail
@donmoyn This must be recent. I returned from abroad on Feb 11th and had to get a negative result with documentation from the administering clinic.
